title: Google Search is testing blue checkmark feature that helps users spot genuine websites
content: Google is testing a verification feature that puts a blue checkmark next to links to genuine sites. Here are the details.
summary: Google is testing a verification feature that puts a blue checkmark next to links to genuine sites. Here are the details.
